name: NEHotspotConfiguration
desc: Configuration settings for a Wi-Fi network.

items.name: ssid
items.desc: The SSID of an open, WEP, WPA/WPA2 personal, or WPA/WPA2 enterprise Wi-Fi network.

items.name: ssidPrefix
items.desc: The string used to match networks against a known SSID prefix.

items.name: lifeTimeInDays
items.desc: The number of days the network retains the associated configuration.

items.name: joinOnce
items.desc: Restricts the lifetime of a configuration to the operating status of the app that created it.

items.name: hidden
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the visibility of the SSID.
